page.title: 04RYDINGS IMPROVEMENT SCHEME
page.content: Keith Cropper,took us into a cabin and showed us a map.He told us that a crane would dig the silt and weed from Rydings Lodge to make it deeper.The silt will be used to improve the farm land.The crane can lift 25 tons of silt.The public will be allowed to walk in the area and to have picnics. The MSC and the EEC have given over half a million pounds for the project. They employ jobless people,most of them are young men between 18 and 25. They have a one year contract.If they are under 18 they can return after 6 months,but those over 18 must wait 1year.The labourers get 46 pounds per week,chargehands 65 pounds and skilled men eg. bricklayers 90 pounds after tax and deductions.I would like to do this job if I could not get another. Really it is a shame that so many people are unemployed.
